title: Amazon S3 to AWS Lambda with Amazon SQS queue
description: Create a Lambda function that is triggered for every jpg image file uploaded to S3 via an SQS queue.

introBox.headline: Create a Lambda function triggered for every jpg image file stored to S3 via SQS
text: Terraform deploys Lambda, SQS, S3, and IAM resources.
SQS consumes S3 .jpg events, triggering Lambda.
Lambda serves as a template for app development.

bullets.text: Configuring an Amazon SQS queue to trigger an AWS Lambda function

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Oriol Matavacas
authors.bio: Oriol Matavacas is a Sr. Solutions Architect at AWS based in Barcelona. Oriol primarily supporting customers on the journey to the Cloud. He enjoys building new solutions with scalability, availability and easy to maintain by using serverless.
